passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(2) > center-l:nth-child(4) > switcher-l > div > div:nth-child(1) > cover-l > stack-l > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > center-l:nth-child(4) > switcher-l > div > div:nth-child(1) > cover-l > stack-l > stack-l:nth-child(3) > cluster-l:nth-child(1) > div > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > center-l:nth-child(4) > switcher-l > div > div:nth-child(1) > cover-l > stack-l > stack-l:nth-child(3) > cluster-l:nth-child(2) > div > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > center-l:nth-child(4) > switcher-l > div > div:nth-child(1) > cover-l > stack-l > stack-l:nth-child(3) > cluster-l:nth-child(3) > div > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > center-l:nth-child(4) > switcher-l > div > div:nth-child(1) > cover-l > stack-l > stack-l:nth-child(3) > cluster-l:nth-child(4) > div > h3:nth-child(2)

any.message: Heading order valid
